title: Track Shoes & Shotguns: From Downtown to the Great Outdoors
description: Famed outdoorsman Gord Follett shares over thirty years of life in sport and hunting in this incredible memoir, starting with his early days in speed walking through his storied career as a Newfoundland & Labrador sportsman, to his passing of the love of all things sport onto the next generation of Newfoundlanders & Labradorians.
author: Gord Follett
